about_the_game:
Prepare for this totally accurate documentary of the 2024 United States Presidential campaign run and election! Take control of the red side of the aisle as you navigate the turbulent campaign trail and win the Presidency. This game sourced some of the greatest political scholars in the world in order to accurately recreate the events over the past few cycles and portray their impact on the 2024 election.

This comedy based game takes a lighthearted look at American politics, utilizing 30+ think quick minigames as your character tries to win the heart of the American people by attempting to dominate the map. Shoot aliens in Area 52, fight off your political enemies and allies, take place in crowd-pleasing antics, get challenged to debates - all the while winning and losing support in states throughout the country. 

Notes:

  • This game currently has 25+ minigames. More will be added in updates.

  • The blue version of this game where you play as the other candidate is upcoming.

  • Characters resembling real life personalities is purely coincidental, of course! For real!
